column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Two words. Tourist. Trap. This tastes like Pizza Hut and is as underwhelming as it is a waste of time. Spent 3 hours waiting for a pizza I will never remember. Once you get in
column2: it's another 45 minutes for the food to cook. So make sure
column3: if you decide to tourist it out
column4: order before you sit or take out.
